name: Ice Age Mammoth Sniper Hunting 2016: Hunt Down Wild Deer and Carnivore Animals
name_original: Ice Age Mammoth Sniper Hunting 2016: Hunt Down Wild Deer and Carnivore Animals
description:
Get ready for the exciting forest and ice age journey!

Dangerous Mammoth Sniper Hunting: Ice Age Arena is the only forest fame game which let you experience the deadly sniper hunting in wild forest and meat-eating ice age arena at the same time. You are landed on an unknown planet, the only friend you have is your sniper rifle along with a hunting pert dog, you are provided with limited ammo so make sure you use your sniper bullets wisely.

*****Background Story*****

Our world is dying only few lives are left on the planet; the ice age is predicted in couple of years, the forest is surrounded with wild and fierce animals like deer, lion, wolf, mammoth, bears and other hungry wild beasts.

The future of human race is in danger therefore, In order to survive the humans are to feed on the animal meat, you were a great soldier and experienced sharpshooter in the old days, it’s time to test your shooting skills and hunt down these wild animals with clear shot. Dangerous Mammoth Sniper Hunting: Ice Age Arena provides you the opportunity to become the predator and hunt the wild animals with sniper shooting.

Unlike other deer hunter games, at every level you are encountered with a deadly carnivore battle with wild animals like lion, tiger, mammoth, deer and wolf, the bullets you have are very precious and the ammo is limited, so you sure you do not fire until you have a clear shot. You also have your hunter dog with you, which can help you scare away the animals so you can reload your sniper gun and start shooting the animals again. Once you are out of ammo the animals will get closer and it will be a suicide mission for you as you are the only one from your squad.

At some levels the dinosaurs will also come in attack, make sure you are saving bullets for these extreme carnivorous animals, they will not die in one bullet.

*****Features*****
- Amazing FPS game play
- Different sniper rifles and guns to choose from
- Complete 3D forest theme
- Call in your hunter dog to kills the animals for you
- Intense Sniper Hunting Missions
- Terrifying roars of wild animals
- Wild animals simulator
- Enter the world of wildlife safari

Do let us know your feedback so we can improve our wild animal hunting games in upcoming updates.
